data.actual_result: "Enter a server name" is the only line that doesn't light up to blue on any occasions, entering the screen nor typing in it.
data.expected_result: There should be a blue line on "Enter a server name" as soon as you enter the screen, or there should be a blue line as soon as you type something in it.
data.short_description: Server name line in "Create a server" screen doesn't have a blue line.
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll down to the + button. - Select "Create a server". - First, notice how on the 'Enter a server name", there's no blue line. - Type something in it, to see if the line lights up to blue.
